content: great write Jonas Ellison. I also believe in creating healthy calm and reasonable boundaries with everyone but with an adaptable mode.The boundaries cannot be static. Your little girl will “grow” up some day.Your “parents” will become “old and helpless” some day and even in office “your boss might change some day”. Since life situations are changing,the boundaries also need to adapt and change so that we are fair and we will be treated fairly by everybody.
